info.name: Eat, Cook, Repeat
info.description:
This API collection contains some operations from a cooking recipe website called Eat, Cook, Repeat ([https://www.figma.com/file/SUbBTYCq1e4ngRt20lSdqr/Food-Recipe?node-id=47:127](https://www.figma.com/file/SUbBTYCq1e4ngRt20lSdqr/Food-Recipe?node-id=47:127))

*   User: Adding/registering the Eat, Cook, Repeat user
*   Recipe:
    

\- Adding and updating the recipe  
\- Latest recipes from Eat, Cook, Repeat

*   Recipe Comment: Adding, updating and deleting the comment of the recipe

}
